sourcesContent:
const FareDetails = () => { const passNum = 3 const fare = 8093 const basefare = fare*passNum const tax = basefare*0.05 const totalfare = tax+basefare return ( <>

Fare Details

Base fare = {passNum}x₹{fare} = ₹{basefare}

Taxes and Surcharges = ₹{tax}

Total fare = ₹{totalfare}

); } export default FareDetails;
